attributes.action: License all Veterans Charity's collecting on the Streets.Produce it on demand.
attributes.background: I am a Veteran and served with The 1st Battalion The Light Infantry.  Veterans/ Soldiers can spot a FAKE from miles away and we are appalled at the number of FAKE collections we see on the Streets.  This give's a totally bad impression of Military Charities. It badly needs to be stopped!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Charities are already regulated by the Charity Commission. You can find out more about the role of the Charity Commission here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/charity-commission/about
